participant_1.background:
I grow my own potatoes and experiment with new seasonings.
I pack my bags for the trip ahead of me.
I'm going to be spending time with my family and friends, and relaxing.
i hate seafood but love mexican food.
i hit for over forty million dollars.

participant_2.background:
I hope that my comics will be published and that people will enjoy them.
i work at a factory.
I try to do my laundry every other day, but I sometimes have to skip a day or two because of my theater commitments.
I have a weekly laundry routine to keep up with my kids' dirty clothes.
i am a childrens librarian.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Hey! Not bad, not bad. Just finished a long day at the factory. How about you?
I am doing pretty well. I am actually getting ready to head out on a trip.
Oh fun! Where are you going?
I am going to be visiting my family and friends back home.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I hope you have a great time!
Thank you! I am looking forward to it. I am also going to be doing some exploring and trying new things.
That sounds great. I love trying new things. I am a bit of a foodie myself. I am always looking for new places to try and new things to cook.
I love trying new things as well. I am not much of a cook, but I do love to eat.
Me too. I love food. I am actually a children's librarian. I love reading and telling stories.
That sounds like a fun job. I love reading as well. I do not know if I could tell stories though.
It is a lot of fun. I get to interact with kids and help them learn to love reading.
That sounds like a great job. I am sure you are doing a great job.
Thank you! I try my best.
I am sure you are doing a great job.
Thank you! I try my best
